column1: 212312,"Director (Film, Television, Radio or Stage)",,"Direct productions or performances
column3: Determine technical requirements of productions or projects
column5: Provide creative leadership to ensure production has desired effect, mood or style
column7: Collaborate with others to determine technical details of productions
column9: Collaborate with others to prepare or perform artistic productions
column13: Coordinate logistics for productions or events
column15: Discuss production content and progress with others
column17: Manage content of broadcasts or presentations
column19: Study scripts to determine project requirements
column23: Edit audio, photographs or video recordings
column25: Write material for artistic or entertainment purposes
column29: Conduct research to inform art, designs or other work
column31: Audition or interview potential performers or staff members
column33: Review details of technical drawings or specifications
column35: Select staff, team members or performers
column37: Maintain inventories of materials, equipment or products
column41: Move and store materials, equipment or products
column45: Maintain knowledge of laws or regulations
